Actions.Name: Lightning Spear
Actions.Effects: Foe is vulnerable and electrified. Ignores cover against electrified foes.

Actions.Name: Deluge
Actions.Description: The inquisitor dashes 2, then deals 2 piercing damage to a foe in range 6.

Actions.Name: Expurgation
Actions.Description: The inquisitor ends their turn, chooses a blast 2 area in range 6, and gains
Actions.Delay: Their next turn must be slow. At the start of that turn, that area erupts with lightning.
Actions.PostAreaEffect: Characters inside must save or take [fray] piercing damage, once, for every character in the area, or just once on a successful save. Electrified foes fail the save.
